cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Class LocalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure.LocalManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LibraryManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class LocalManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, LibraryManager
    This class is designed to maintain all of the stories that are stored locally on the user's device. Saving, Loading, and Deleting are handled.
    Author:
    Reginald Miller, Jesse Chu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
